overview: Dario Dâ€™Aprile is the VP of digital media for Fox & National Geographic Channels (FIC & NGCI). He took up the role in London in January 2009, and he is responsible for the international output over the Internet, helping audiences enjoy a seamless experience of FOX and National Geographic programmes, wherever they may be. He was previously manager of marketing and digital for FIC & NGCI Italy, having joined the Corporation in May 2005. Within this role, Dario was responsible setting up of the online division to ensure that the FIC led the industry in its approach to new media.
